trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for design-time support for controls that derive from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref>.

Extend the DataBoundControlDesigner class if you want to create a designer for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> Web server control or for a class that extends <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object for this designer.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object associated with this designer.
Disconnects events from the previous data source and connects them to the current data source.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data-bound control connected to a new data source; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the data source did not change.

Invokes the standard dialog box to create a new data source control, and sets the new data source control's ID to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property of the data-bound control.
Binds the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object to the data source.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object to bind to the data source.
Gets the shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*> property of the underlying data-bound control.
The shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*> of the underlying data-bound control.
Gets the designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.
The designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the data source of this designer.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the data source of this designer.
Disconnects the data-bound control from data source events.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
The Dispose method unregisters the designer's event handlers from all data source events.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.

Gets the design-time data source from either the associated <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSourceDesigner" name="DataSourceDesigner" href=""></xref> or the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSource" name="DataSource" href=""></xref> property.
An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface referencing the design-time data source.

Gets dummy sample data to render the data-bound control on the design surface if sample data cannot be created from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSourceDesigner" name="DataSourceDesigner" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSource" name="DataSource" href=""></xref> properties.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing dummy sample data used to render the data-bound control on the design surface.
Overridden by the designer to shadow run-time properties of the data-bound control with corresponding properties implemented by the designer.
Override the PreFilterProperties method to perform any additional actions required when the data source of the underlying data-bound control changes.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object containing the properties to filter.
Gets the number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.
The number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer can refresh the data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
Indicates whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> object that describes the data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider> interface.

The selected data member from the selected data source, if the control allows the user to select an <xref uid="langword_csharp_IListSource" name="IListSource" href=""></xref> object (such as a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object) for the data source, and provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*> property to select a particular list (or <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object) within the data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider.GetSelectedDataSource*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider> interface.

An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*> property of the associated control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
Gets a value indicating whether the designer should include "Choose a data source" in its action list.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
